Name Rascal/Libraries/Graph/top

Function set[&T] top(Graph[&T] G)
Description Returns the top nodes of Graph G, i.e., the root nodes that do not have any predecessors.
Examples 
rascal>import Graph;
ok
rascal>top({<1,2>, <1,3>, <2,4>, <3,4>});
set[int]: {1}
